testCase.name: User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/register when the data is correct should create a new user
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/register when the email address is invalid should throw an error - Email is not valid
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/register when the password is less than 6 characters should throw an error with a message for acceptable password patterns
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/register when there is no upper case letter in the password should throw an error with a message for acceptable password patterns
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/register when the password contains no integer should throw an error with a message for acceptable password patterns
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/register when there is no special character in the password should throw an error with a message for acceptable password patterns
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/validate when there is an existing user with the same email should throw an error - a user with this email already exist
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/validate when there is an existing user with the same phone number should throw an error - a user with this phone already exist
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/validate when all the validation pass should send OTP to the phone number of the user
User [Controller] Integration Test GET /users/photo should throw an error if the user is not authenticated
User [Controller] Integration Test GET /users/photo should return photo
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/update should throw an error if the user is not authenticated
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/update should update user data
User [Controller] Integration Test PUT /users/:id/change-password should throw an error if the user does not exist
User [Controller] Integration Test PUT /users/:id/change-password should throw an error if the user old password does not match
User [Controller] Integration Test PUT /users/:id/change-password should throw an error if the user new password fails validation
User [Controller] Integration Test PUT /users/:id/change-password should update user password if all the validation checks are passed
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/reset-password should provide email address
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/reset-password should throw an error if the user does not exist
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/reset-password should reset user password
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/check should pass user check
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/otp/send should send OTP to the user's phone
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/otp/verify should verify user's OTP
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/otp/verify should fail OTP verification if the code is not correct
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/otp/verify should fail OTP verification if the provided phone is not found
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/existing should throw error if the user already exist
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/existing should not find existing user
User [Controller] Integration Test POST /users/access/generate should generate a new twilio token
User Model Unit Test should be defined
User Model Unit Test should be a BaseModel
User Model Unit Test should be a Model
User Model Unit Test should have a tableName
User Model Unit Test should return hidden fields
User Model Unit Test should have a jsonSchema
User Service Unit Test should be defined
User Service Unit Test should create a new user
User Service Unit Test should not create a new user if email is invalid
User Service Unit Test should not create a user if password is less than 6 characters
User Service Unit Test should validate a user
User Service Unit Test should fail validation if user email already exists
User Service Unit Test should fail validation if user phone already exists
User Service Unit Test should get one user
User Service Unit Test should login a user with email
User Service Unit Test should login a user with phone
User Service Unit Test should not login with invalid email
User Service Unit Test should not login with invalid phone
User Service Unit Test should not login with invalid password
User Service Unit Test should log a user out
User Service Unit Test should generate JWT token
User Service Unit Test should throw error generating JWT token if id is not provided
User Service Unit Test should decode JWT token
User Service Unit Test should throw error while decoding JWT token
User Service Unit Test should update user password
User Service Unit Test should not update user password if old password is incorrect
User Service Unit Test should not update user password if password validation fails
User Service Unit Test should not update user password if the user does not exist
User Service Unit Test should not reset user password if an email is not provided
User Service Unit Test should not reset user password if a user with the email does not exist
User Service Unit Test should reset user password if an email is provided and a user with the email exist
User Service Unit Test should update user
User Service Unit Test should check for existing user and throw error if the user already exist
User Service Unit Test should check for existing user and not throw error if the user does not exist already
CodeSystem [Controller] Integration Test POST /systems when passed in correct data should create a new code system
CodeSystem [Controller] Integration Test GET /systems/marital_status when there is data with type of marital_status should return code systems with type marital_status

CodeSystem [Controller] Integration Test GET /systems/relationships
CodeSystem [Controller] Integration Test GET /systems/qualifications
CodeSystem [Controller] Integration Test GET /systems/durations

Code System Service Unit Test should add new code system
